name: organo gold coffee
description: organo gold is a health benefit coffee
overview:
Reinaldo Alvarez is a man full of passion for life and happiness but not just for him but for others!

Born in Haiti and years later, made it to America in 1989 and resided in Philadelphia Pennsylvania with his family. “Al” as his close friends know him, has served in the United States Army and served in war in Kosovo and Afghanistan and was awarded many awards.

He began as an entrepreneur with his first business as a restaurateur. He created jobs for a handful of individuals and knew he needed to do more…not just for him but for his family and those he brought along in his business. He found it necessary to focus on his family and his new career and therefore closed “Big Al’s Lil Diner” forever.

In 2011 Mr. Alvarez used his own finances to fund a small orphanage in Haiti. It is his hope to increase the size and the number of children that need a home in the very near future.

In 2011, he was introduced to Organo Gold and the unlimited opportunity it provides its independent distributors and his passion has matured to new heights! Now, on his time, he has unlimited success potential and he wants to share this with you!

http://www.grouppfg.com/index.php
